### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal Mine at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position unknown)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Assembling machine (position unknown)
-  Inserter (position unknown)
-  Beltgroup (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
